articles.title: Tata Steel, ONGC in action after Sensex rejig - Business Standard
articles.description: Tata Steel will replace ONGC in the 30-share benchmark S&P BSE Sensex effective Monday, 21 June 2021.
articles.content:
Tata Steel will replace ONGC in the 30-share benchmark S&P BSE Sensex effective Monday, 21 June 2021.

articles.title: B.1.617.2 becoming dominant variant in India, finds genome sequencing - India Today
articles.description: Experts in genomic sequencing of Covid-19 variants in India have revealed cases showing B.1.617.2 are slowly eclipsing most variants including the Kent variant that originated in UK (known as B.1.1.7).
articles.content: The United Kingdom has been closely watching the movement of the sub-lineages of the B.1.617 variant that originated in India - B1617.1, B1617.2, and B.617.3. Experts in genomic sequencing of Covid-1… [+7940 chars]
